content: The Efficient User: These users value efficiency and speed when booking appointments. They may be frustrated by any delays or obstacles that prolong the process, as expressed in the quote "I rather do it online than in person, but while drinking some coffee, because of a long time, it takes me to find and fill this." This archetype could include older users, users with disabilities, and users who prefer to use mobile devices. It could also include foreigners who may be unfamiliar with the website or who do not speak Spanish, as well as tech-savvy users who may have high expectations for the user experience.
